PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-05982024-05-24PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder amending the mandate of the Leaders' Debate Commission
PrecisOrder amending the Order in Council establishing the Leaders' Debates Commission in order to allow the most the senior-most executive member of the Commission to exercise the powers and perform the duties of the Commissioner in the event of a vacancy, absence, or incapacity.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending the Order in Council establishing the Leaders' Debates Commission in order to allow the most the senior-most executive member of the Commission to exercise the powers and perform the duties of the Commissioner in the event of a vacancy, absence, or incapacity.
